title: Some tips ,Just for myself
zzzContent:
1 .bashrc文件
<coolcode>
 43 ip=`ifconfig|grep inet|head -n 1|awk '/inet(.*)netmask/ {print $2}'`

 44 if [ "x$YROOT_NAME" != "x" ]; then
 45     PS1="[$YROOT_NAME:$ip w]\n$"
 46 else
 47      PS1="[`hostname`  u@$ip:w]n>"
 48 fi
 49 alias pub="sh ./.pub"
 50 alias ci ="sh ./.ci"
</coolcode>
1. .ci文件
<coolcode>

  1 #! /bin/sh
  2
  3 arg=$1
  4 pwd=`pwd`
  5 dirs
  6 echo $cwd
  7 if [ -z $arg ]; then
  8     echo "exit"
  9     exit
 10 fi
 11 svn  status|awk '!/.pub|.check|.ci$/ {print $0}'| awk '/^(M|A)/ {print "svn     ci " $2 " -m '$arg'"}'

</coolcode>

.pub文件
<coolcode>
rsync -r ./ /home/y/share/htodcs/project
</coolcode>
